channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: ðŸ”´ 14:14 Air alarm to the Rivne region follow the following messages.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 14:14 Air alarm to the Rivne region follow the following messages.#Rivne_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
